valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Fri 14 Nov 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 15 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 986 moving slowly eastwards, expected FitzRoy 990 by midnight tonight. Low Sole 991 losing its identity
